Text: Brorhilker has estimated that the alleged scheme she is prosecuting cost Germany some 450 million euros in lost taxes. She said the two men had started it when working at German bank HVB, before moving to a small investment firm, tapping a wide network of contacts to arrange the trades, sometimes splitting the profit made with banks.

Effect: Brorhilker has estimated that the alleged scheme she is prosecuting cost Germany some 450 million euros in lost taxes.
Sentence: <e2>Brorhilker has estimated that the alleged scheme she is prosecuting cost Germany some 450 million euros in lost taxes.</e2> <e1>She said the two men had started it when working at German bank HVB, before moving to a small investment firm, tapping a wide network of contacts to arrange the trades, sometimes splitting the profit made with banks.</e1>
